summary: MY 2002 PASSAT IS LESS THAN 6 MTHS OLD (5,500 MILES) AND A COIL MALFUNCTIONED.  MY CAR WAS TOWED TO THE VW DEALER WHERE I WAS TOLD THEY WILL REPLACE THE FAILED COIL, BUT NONE OF THE OTHERS, EVEN THOUGH THEY ADMIT THAT THEY WILL MOST LIKELY FAIL.  I WILL NOW BE DRIVING AROUND WAITING FOR MY CAR TO BREAKDOWN.  AS A SINGLE FEMALE, I DON'T FIND THIS TO BE A SAFE ALTERNATIVE.
